T02TD3587E:218a-1: a'a rya ma h'a sa ha sras pra marda n'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD3587E:218a-3: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3587E:218a-4: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3587E:218a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bh'um yig las byung ba'i stong chen mo rab tu 'joms par bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD3587E:218a-6: sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig pa /
T02TD3587E:218a-8: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na ral gri dang /
T02TD3587E:218a-10: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD3587E:218a-11: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD3587E:218a-13: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la tsho gzhon zhing sgeg pa'i sku nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD3587E:218a-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3587E:218a-15: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
